definition: to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: My Mary's asleep by thy murmuring stream.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地流，甜美的亞頓河，你流過碧坡青山。

sentences.english: COMMUNICATION Go slow and don t try to share every tidbit of information about yourself over night.
sentences.chinese: 通訊怠工和頓河筆嘗試分享自己的資料每粒一夜之間。

sentences.english: Flow gently, sweet Afton, disturb not her dream.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地流淌，甜美的亞頓河，別把她的夢兒攪散。

sentences.english: Flow gently, sweet Afton, among thy green braes.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地流淌，甜美的亞頓河，在碧綠的山坡之間。

sentences.english: The second part devotes to the identity analysis and the stylistic features of the two DonRhapsody.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分兩首《頓河狂想曲》的本體分析與風格特徵。

sentences.english: Neither the upper bend of the don, nor the crucial land bridge, had been secured .
sentences.chinese: 上游的頓河河曲和關係重大的陸口橋樑此時都未到手。

sentences.english: Bright yellow foliage on a tree on the edge of the Pompton River in Lincoln Park.
sentences.chinese: 明亮的黃色樹葉掛在林肯公園波普頓河邊的樹枝上。

sentences.english: Flow gently, sweet Afton, disturb not her dreams.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地流淌，甜美的亞頓河，別把她的夢兒攪散。
